name: Invasion (itch) (trainarmadillo88)
description:
The 3rd Fleet is coming for your homeworld!

Central has tasked you to defend its honor from the Imperialists pigs.

Will you destroy the enemy for the glory of the motherland?

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This was a game produced within 3 weeks to learn Unity. There are actually a lot of things I would do differently. I will probably release a Mac and Linux version sometime later, but till then I'll relax a bit, continue doing my actual work, and plan on trying something else later next month.

Controls

  • left and right arrow keys move
  • ctrl  shoots
  • health will regen over time 
  • ammo will regen over time
  • Any ships that will pass you will lower your score

Credits

Art assets 'Spaceships "XENIS"' by Carlos Alface
